replies.body:
I wouldn't use it yet until the 13th just to be sure. Basically just use it when riot mentions it somewhere.

It's kinda dumb riot didn't mention the time zone they would be using to release this promo and now people have used their prepaid cards and got no bonus rp. {{champion:32}}

It's up now. We messed up in that we used the US times and prices in the announcement.

You can see the full details here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-here-limited-time

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LlTW7rzm,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-12T02:00:45.614+0000)
>
> It's up now. We messed up in that we used the US times and prices in the announcement.
> 
> You can see the full details here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-here-limited-time

can I still get the bonus? already sent a support ticket. nvm just read the post

Hi,

can you please check up on the RAD errors please? I've created like 2 discussions but still no responses from any of you.
rune sales aren't up either...unless rune prices went up by 30% when I wasn't looking
Ur the biggest idiot, rune sales are on the 23rd january
No I tried it :( had to send a support ticket you'd think it would be up its 11 am the 12th in my time zone :L
I am assuming it will be when it clocks over to the 12th in NA :(
